long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This app allows you to use Chrome to record your screen for the use as training or marketing materials. There are an impressive array of tools at your disposal to allow you to record create and distribute your message and you can manage the data of the people who interact with your message too. You can auto-post materials to social media, and get data back about the best times to post and the engagement rates of your articles. Visit www.hexisplus.com for more details on how you can get you free account for your business.
